questions.question: Does the README contain instructions for starting Strfry relay locally?
questions.actionable_check: Check README.md for a section explaining how to start the relay using docker compose
questions.pass_criteria: README contains clear instructions with docker compose command and ws://localhost:8080 URL

questions.question: Does the documentation reference the strfry.conf configuration file?
questions.actionable_check: Check README.md for mention of strfry.conf and its location
questions.pass_criteria: Documentation mentions strfry.conf as the relay configuration file in project root

questions.question: Does the documentation include cleanup/stop commands for the relay?
questions.actionable_check: Check for docker compose down commands with and without -v flag
questions.pass_criteria: Both stop (preserving data) and cleanup (deleting data) commands are documented

questions.question: Does the documentation explain that E2E tests use the relay automatically?
questions.actionable_check: Check for mention of E2E test integration with relay
questions.pass_criteria: Documentation explains relay starts automatically as part of E2E Docker Compose stack

questions.question: Are the documented commands copy-pasteable and correct?
questions.actionable_check: Verify documented compose commands reference the correct file names and service names
evidence_required: File names match actual compose files
questions.pass_criteria: All commands use correct file names (docker-compose.dev.yml, docker-compose.e2e.yml) and service names

mandatory_questions.question: Do all existing unit tests continue to pass (no regressions from story 05 changes)?
mandatory_questions.actionable_check: Run npx jest --testPathIgnorePatterns=e2e and verify results match baseline
evidence_required: Test run output with pass/fail counts
mandatory_questions.pass_criteria: Test results within baseline range (22-24 pre-existing failures, no new failures)
